arguments.name: DATA=
arguments.description: names the input data table for PROC TSCUSTINT to use

arguments.name: INTERVALNAME=
arguments.description: specifies the custom interval name to use as syntax in interval functions such as INTNX and INTCK, and in the INTERVAL= option of the ID statement for procedures such as PROC TSMODEL

arguments.name: NTHREADS=
arguments.description: specifies the number of threads that are used per worker node in a CAS session

statements.name: INPUTROLES
statements.description: enables you to specify names for custom interval definition variables in the DATA= data table

arguments.name: BEGIN=
arguments.description: specifies the name of the variable in the DATA= data table that contains the beginning SAS date, SAS datetime, or observation number for each interval bin

arguments.name: END=
arguments.description: specifies the name of the variable in the DATA= data table that contains the ending SAS date, SAS datetime, or observation number for each interval bin

arguments.name: SEASON=
arguments.description: specifies the name of the variable in the DATA= data table that contains the seasonal index for each interval bin
